### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name TEXT,
    asset_type TEXT,
    asset_link TEXT,
    blockchain_transaction_id UUID
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE digital_assets SET asset_name = 'New Name' WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
